titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2888)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/15/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1996, the duty on photoreceptors or assemblies containing photoreceptors of electrostatic copying machines, which operate by reproducing the original image via an intermediate.
